üìç Drop

Drop aims to aid the cause to spend more time outdoors, giving users a reason to head out and explore by providing a platform to share content about highly localised areas. Drop achieves this by giving users options to ‚Äúdrop‚Äù a message in the world and other users can find these drops by exploring outdoors, incentivising exploration.
